en: Dominique informs you that it would be prudent to comb through your online profiles and remove from public view anything that might reveal your personal information or that of your family. He's found some... unprofessional photos of you on Facebook. But when you google your own name, you realize it'll take all day to get done. What do you do?

It takes far more work than you imagined - so many random sites have your address, and require actual work to have them taken down! Still, you get some peace of mind from knowing you're safer now than you were before.
You decide to try not to worry about it. Who's really going to spend the time to come after you, anyways?
